job_tasks.phrase: Through your machine learning solutions, you create simplified processes for our customers and help us establish ourselves as 'digital first'.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the need to understand how ML solutions contribute to business goals like simplifying processes and establishing a 'digital first' approach.

job_tasks.phrase: Through your solutions, the data team and the AI team create more business value.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the responsibility to align AI and data efforts with the objective of creating business value.

job_tasks.phrase: using AI models.
job_tasks.justification: Indicates the core activity of utilizing AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: You are able to take the lead in devising and designing AI-driven applications.
job_tasks.justification: This points to the design and conceptualization of applications driven by AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: We are currently mainly building state-of-the-art applications with (OpenAI's GPT) LLMs.
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions the use and development of applications based on LLMs, a core aspect of generative modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: You will develop a scalable solution that will generate email responses to incoming emails using LLM agentic frameworks (Langchain, Langgraph)
job_tasks.justification: Describes a specific generative AI task (generating email responses) using advanced LLM frameworks.

job_tasks.phrase: You bring AI models (data products) to production, for example in the form of APIs
job_tasks.justification: This involves the deployment and operationalization of AI models, which is closely linked to the modeling lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: everything is secure, scalable and repeatable.
job_tasks.justification: These are key software engineering concerns for building production-grade applications.

job_tasks.phrase: You will work closely with the Data Scientists to improve the Machine Learning Lifecycle.
job_tasks.justification: Implies collaboration on the end-to-end lifecycle, which includes software development aspects.

job_tasks.phrase: The focus is on code quality, CI/CD, testing and monitoring.
job_tasks.justification: These are fundamental software development practices for building reliable systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Security is an important part of your application and you are aware of the compliance rules within NN.
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the need for secure software development and adherence to organizational policies.

job_tasks.phrase: If you would love to experience an overlap of AI, Software and Data Engineering in your work, then this is your place.
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly states the integration of AI with software and data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: You bring AI models (data products) to production, for example in the form of APIs
job_tasks.justification: Developing APIs to serve AI models falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: You develop AI applications based on CI/CD, high-quality code, testing and monitoring,
job_tasks.justification: This reiterates the focus on building AI applications using standard software development practices like CI/CD and code quality.

job_tasks.phrase: You develop and maintain the machine learning infrastructure, fitting into the NN landscape
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to building and managing the infrastructure for ML models, a key MLOps responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: The focus is on code quality, CI/CD, testing and monitoring.
job_tasks.justification: While also software development, CI/CD, testing, and monitoring are critical for operationalizing and maintaining models in production.

job_tasks.phrase: You develop AI applications based on CI/CD, high-quality code, testing and monitoring,
job_tasks.justification: Reinforces the MLOps aspect through CI/CD, testing, and monitoring in the context of AI application development.

job_tasks.phrase: knowledge transfer and coaching are also an important part of your job.
job_tasks.justification: This implies understanding the business need for upskilling the team.

job_tasks.phrase: The goal is to take the engineering skills of your fellow data scientists to the next level, among other things by following best practices.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates an understanding of business objectives related to team skill development and adherence to standards.

job_tasks.phrase: improve the Machine Learning Lifecycle.
job_tasks.justification: The ML lifecycle encompasses model development, training, and evaluation.

soft_skills.phrase: take the engineering skills of your fellow data scientists to the next level
You will work closely with the Data Scientists
You will work closely with your fellow machine learning engineer.
In this process, we learn a lot from each other.
In your work, you experience a lot of freedom and responsibility.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building applications with LLMs, including advanced tasks like agentic frameworks (Langchain, Langgraph) and generating responses. It also explicitly mentions 'AI, Software and Data Engineering' overlap, aligning perfectly with the 'GenAI Engineer' definition focused on developing user-facing software systems powered by generative models.
